column2: "Na ber a Apollos wɔ Korinte no
column3: Paul kotwaa mu wɔ amantsifi asaase no do no

column2: "na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom gyee dzii no
column4: hom nyaa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no? Na wɔsee no dɛ
column5: Yɛnntsee pɛn mpo dɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn bi wɔ beebi."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze mu na wonumaa hom hyɛe? Na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Paul see dɛ
column3: John dze nnuho enuma no numae see nkorɔfo no dɛ wɔngye nyia odzi n'ekyir reba no ndzi

column2: "Na wɔtsee no
column3: wɔmaa wonumaa hɔn hyɛɛ Ewuradze Jesus dzin mu."

column2: "Na Paul dze ne nsa guu hɔn do no
column3: Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no baa hɔn do

column2: "Nna hɔn nyina bɛyɛ mbarimba duebien."
"Na ɔkɔr nhyiamudan no mu
column3: na ɔdze akokodur kaa asɛm no ara abosoom ebiasa
column4: na ɔnye hɔn rekasa nyina nna ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ mu yie ama wɔaagye dza ɔfa Nyankopɔn ahendzi ho no edzi."

column2: "Nna binom akoma epirim
column3: na woenntsie
column4: na wɔkasaa Ɔkwan no ho bɔn wɔ nyimpadodow no enyim no
column5: ofii hɔn nkyɛn na oyii esuafo no fii hɔn mu; na daa ɔnye hɔn kasae wɔ Tiranus ne nkyerɛkyerɛbea hɔ."

column2: "Na iyi kɔr do ara kodur mfe ebien
column3: ma dɛm no hɔn a wɔwɔ Asia nyina tsee Ewuradze asɛm

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn nam Paul nsa do yɛɛ tum ndwuma soronko:"
"ma woyiyii no ho nduukuu anaa nsamenyim mpo koguu ayarfo do
column3: ma yarba fii hɔn do
column4: na esunsum bɔn so fii hɔn mu."

column2: "Na Jewfo bi a wokyinkyin tu mbɔnsam sii hɔn bo dɛ wɔbɔbɔ Ewuradze Jesus dzin wɔ hɔn a wɔwɔ esunsum bɔn no do
column3: dɛ
column4: Meka Jesus a Paul ka no ho asɛm no gu hom do."

column2: "Na Jewnyi sɔfopanyin bi a ɔdze Skeva ne mba beesuon bi na wɔyɛɛ dɛm."
"Na sunsum bɔn no buae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Jesus minyim
column5: na hom dze hom nye woananom?"

column2: "Na nyimpa no a sunsum bɔn wɔ no do no tui hyɛɛ hɔn do
column3: na ɔboor hɔn pasaa
column4: na wɔdze adagyaw nye pira guanguanee fii fie no mu."

column2: "Na Jewfo nye Griikfo a wɔwɔ Efeso nyina tsee yi
column3: na hu kaa hɔn nyina
column4: na wohuhoor Ewuradze Jesus ne dzin."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔagye edzi no mu pii so bae bɛkae na wobeyii hɔn ndzeyɛɛ kyerɛe."
"Na hɔn a wɔyɛɛ esumandze mu pii dze hɔn nwoma bae bɛhyeew no wɔ nyimpa nyina enyim; na wobuu no bo ano no
column3: wohun dɛ osii ndwetɛbona mpem eduonum."

column2: "Mbrɛ Nyankopɔn asɛm nam ahoɔdzen do nyinii na odzii nyim nye no."
"Na wowiee iyinom no
column3: Paul bɔɔ ne tsirmu pɔw wɔ sunsum mu dɛ sɛ otwa mu wɔ Masidonia nye Akaia a

column2: "Na ɔsomaa hɔn a wɔsoom no no mu beenu
column3: Timoti nye Erastus

column2: "Na ber no ara mu na sakasaka kɛsenara bae wɔ Ɔkwan no ho."
"Na dwetɛdwimfo bi a ne dzin dze Demitrius a ɔdze dwetɛ yɛ ɔbosom Artemis asɔrdan no sɛso honyi
column3: na n'edwuma no dze mfaso pii brɛɛ edwimfo no
column5: "na ɔboaa hɔn nye hɔn a wɔyɛ edwuma kor no ara bi ano
column8: hom nyim dɛ edwuma yi mu na yenya hɛn ahonya."

column2: "Na hom ehu na hom atse dɛ nnyɛ Efeso ha nko
column3: na aka kakra na ayɛ Asia nyina
column4: na Paul yi etu nyimpadodow pii hɔn aso esuma
column5: na ɔadan hɔn enyi dɛ dza wɔdze nsa ayɛ hɔn no nnyɛ enyame
column7: "na nnyɛ hɛn edwin yi nko na ɔreyɛ ayɛ gyan
column8: na nyamebaa Artemis kɛse n'asɔrfi rebɛyɛ dɛ wommbu no hwee bio
column9: na woetu ɔno a Asia nyina nye wiadze nyina sɔr no no efi n'akɛseyɛ mu."

column2: "Na wɔtsee iyi no
column3: ebufuw hyɛɛ hɔn ma

column2: "Na sakasaka hyɛɛ kurow no ma
column3: na wɔyɛɛ adwenkor bɔɔ krididi kɛkyeer Masidoniafo Gaius nye Aristarkus a wɔka Paul ho wɔ n'akwantu mu no
column4: kɔr bea a nkorɔfo kɔ hɔ kɔhwɛ agor no."

column2: "Paul pɛɛ dɛ ɔkɛhɛn nkorɔfo no mu naaso esuafo no amma no kwan."
"Na Asia mpanyimfo bi so a wɔyɛ n'adɔfo somae ma wɔkɔr no hɔ kɛserɛɛ no dɛ mma ɔnnkɔ agohwɛbea no mu hɔ."
"Na afei binom retsea mu dɛm
column3: binom so retsea mu dɛm; na nhyiamu no ayɛ sakasaka; na dodowara yie nnyim siantsir a ɔnam do ma wobehyiae."

column2: "Na wɔtwee Alɛksandar fii nyimpadodow no mu
column3: na Jewfo no sunsuun no too kan. Na Alɛksandar dze ne nsa nyamee
column4: na ɔpɛɛ dɛ oyi n'ano kyerɛ nkorɔfo no."

column2: "Na wohun dɛ ɔyɛ Jewnyi no
column3: hɔn nyina dze ndze kor tseaa mu bɛyɛ ndɔnhwer ebien dɛ

column2: "Na ɔmankyerɛwfo no dwedwee nyimpadodow no
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: nyimpa bɛn na onnyim dɛ Efesofo kurow no yɛ Artemis kɛse nye honyi a ofiir Zeus bodwirii no hɔn asɔrfihwɛfo?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi obiara runntum nnkasa nntsia iyinom
column3: ɔsɛ hom dɛ hom yɛ komm

column2: "Na hom dze mbarimba yi a wɔnnyɛ asɔrfi ewifo
column3: eso wɔnnka hɛn nyamebaa ho ebususɛm yi aba ha."

column2: "Na afei
column3: sɛ Demitrius nye edwimfo a wɔka no ho no wɔ obi ho asɛm bi a
column5: ambradofo wɔ hɔ: hom mma wombeyi atsɛn."

column2: "Na sɛ hom rohwehwɛ biribi wɔ nsɛm afofor bi ho a
column3: wobedzi no bagua mu dɛ mbrɛ mbra tse."

column2: "Na yɛreyɛ enya amandze so ndɛ
column3: sɛ wɔkɔtoa hɛn wɔ ndɛ begyabegya yi ho a
column4: yennyi biribiara a yɛdze botum eyi hɛn ano wɔ nguabɔ yi ho."

column2: "Na ɔkaa dɛm no
column3: ɔmaa bagua no tui."
